name: Aura of Khorne
shortText: Reroll 1s to Hit for melee weapons
fullText: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model.

effects.effectText: Reroll 1s to hit with melee weapons

name: Aura of Khorne (General)
fullText: If this model is a general, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS KHORNE units wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Aura of Tzeentch
fullText: You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH units wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Aura of Tzeentch (General)
shortText: Ignore spells and endless spells on 5+.
fullText: If this model is a general, each time a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS TZEENTCH unit wholly within 12" of this model is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 5+, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.

name: Aura of Nurgle
shortText: 6 to wound with melee weapon = +1 damage
fullText: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE unit wholly within 12" of any friendly models with this ability is 6, add 1 to the damage inflicted by that attack.

effects.effectText: Add 1 to the damage inflicted by that attack.

name: Aura of Nurgle (General)
shortText: -1 to hit rolls for missile weapons that target this
fullText: If this model is a general, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS NURGLE units wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Aura of Slaanesh
shortText: 6 to hit with melee weapon = 2 hits
fullText: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH unit wholly within 12" of this model is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

name: Aura of Slaanesh (General)
fullText: If this model is a general, you can re-roll run and charge rolls for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH units wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Aura of Chaos Undivided
fullText: Do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED units wholly within 12" of this model.

name: Aura of Chaos Undivided (General)
fullText: If this model is a general, roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS UNDIVIDED unit wholly within 12" of this model. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated
